metadata.subject: Trump-Deutsche Bank links in sights of U.S. House investigators

analysis.summary: Richard Kahn emails Jeffrey Epstein a Reuters news article about U.S. House investigators examining Trump's financial connections to Deutsche Bank, marked as high importance.
